title: WORK
text:
I worked for nearly five years at Rocket Path, a digital agency in Greece.
I initially learned Drupal and PHP on the job. I contributed to various E-commerce projects and independently developed multiple presentation websites and HTML landing pages, along with SCSS and JavaScript. In my last 2 years, I joined the React team, building decoupled E-commerce websites using Next.js and Chakra UI.

In summer 2024, I moved to the Netherlands and joined the Coolset team, a company providing a sustainability and supply chain platform that helps teams manage carbon emissions and meet ESG compliance requirements. The frontend is primarily built with React and TypeScript.

With a packed schedule over the years, personal projects were limited, but between these roles, I worked on a few, some of which are showcased below.
